attributes.action: Declare tax exiles as 'Economic Combatants' and bar them all future entry to the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you leave the U.K. to avoid paying your fair share into supporting our society, then you should be removed of the right to return at any future time. I also would prefer this policy to be called the 'One way exit'.
